io.spine.client

Class SubscribingRequest<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends io.spine.base.MessageContext,W extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends SubscribingRequest<M,C,W,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.client.ClientRequest
      • io.spine.client.FilteringRequest<M,io.spine.client.Topic,TopicBuilder,B>
        • io.spine.client.SubscribingRequest<M,C,W,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of the subscribed messages
    C - the type of the context of messages or EmptyContext if messages do not have a context
    W - the type of the message that wraps a message and its context (e.g. Event); if subscribed message type does not have a context, this parameter is likely to be the same as M
    B - the type of this requests for return type covariance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventSubscriptionRequest, SubscriptionRequest

    public abstract class SubscribingRequest<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends io.spine.base.MessageContext,W extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends SubscribingRequest<M,C,W,B>>
extends FilteringRequest<M,io.spine.client.Topic,TopicBuilder,B>
    Abstract base for client requests that subscribe to messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      B observe(java.util.function.Consumer<M> consumer)
      Subscribes the passed consumer to receive messages of the subscribed type.
      B onConsumingError(ConsumerErrorHandler<M> handler)
      Assigns a handler for an error that may occur in the code of one of the consumers.
      B onStreamingError(ErrorHandler handler)
      Assigns a handler for the error reported to StreamObserver.onError(Throwable) of the StreamObserver responsible for delivering messages to the consumers.
      io.spine.client.Subscription post()
      Creates and posts the subscription request to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • observe

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public B observe(java.util.function.Consumer<M> consumer)
        Subscribes the passed consumer to receive messages of the subscribed type.

      • onStreamingError

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
 @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public B onStreamingError(ErrorHandler handler)
        Assigns a handler for the error reported to StreamObserver.onError(Throwable) of the StreamObserver responsible for delivering messages to the consumers.

        Once this handler is called, no more messages will be delivered to consumers.

        Overrides:
        onStreamingError in class ClientRequest
        See Also:
        SubscribingRequest.onConsumingError(ConsumerErrorHandler)

      • onConsumingError

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public B onConsumingError(ConsumerErrorHandler<M> handler)
        Assigns a handler for an error that may occur in the code of one of the consumers.

        After this handler called, remaining consumers will get the message as usually.

        See Also:
        SubscribingRequest.onStreamingError(ErrorHandler)

      • post

        public io.spine.client.Subscription post()
        Creates and posts the subscription request to the server.
